snippet.title: Monomyth ~ Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
MONOMYTH is an immersive, first-person dungeon crawling RPG in the vein of Ultima Underworld, Arx Fatalis, and the King’s Field series.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/908360/Monomyth/
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/836367155/monomyth
Discord: https://discord.gg/EPUxVzgw
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rattower
Website: http://rattowersoftware.com/
